entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
